response.summary: Ingeniera química de la Universidad Nacional de Colombia, Master en Ingeniería de Procesos de L’Université de Lorraine de Francia. Con experiencia nacional e internacional en la industria. Experiencia en planeación y ejecución de proyectos de excelencia operacional, mejoramiento y estandarización de operaciones y desarrollo de programas de entrenamiento operacionales específicos, en multinacionales del sector industrial. Con conocimientos en investigación, gestión de proyectos y mejoramiento continuo, entrenamiento y trabajo directo con el cliente. Fácil adaptabilidad y excelente aptitud  para el trabajo con equipos interdisciplinares e interculturales. Responsable, lider y con alta orientación al logro de objetivos. Completo dominio del inglés y francés.
response.skills: Seis Sigma, Process Engineering, Process estudy and development, Energy, Aspen simulation, Matlab, Hydrocarbon Trasnportation and Treatment, French, English, Intercultural Communication, Group Work, HSE, Ingeniería de procesos, Liderazgo, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel

profile_positions.description:
Management, development and implementation of operational excellence, process standardization and improvement projects and training programs with national and international companies of the industrial sector. 

•	Management of information and development of  procedures, manuals and basis of operation for process plants of various companies. 
•	Consultancy and support to the client. On site work for the coordination and management of the project’s schedule of activities, proper development of the program, and on site personnel training.  
•	Implementation of 5s methodology to improve the performance of the companies and generate continuous improvement. 
•	As a result, I’ve successfully achieved the development and execution (on the stablished times) of the operational excellence programs for operators and engineers. 
•	Thanks to this job, the companies achieved an increase of their process plants’ productivity. Increasing their KPIs performance indicators
profile_positions.title: Operational Excellece Associate Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Development, as part of the « Global Manufacturing Training » project, of the process standardization and the training program for the product reception and transfer unit (by sea and river side) in the refinery of Notre-Dame de Gravenchon, France:

•	As a result, I developed the training program for the operators of the mentioned unit.
•	I analyzed and developed the techniques and basis of operation on the unit during normal operation and in operation undergoing maintenance or an accident as well as the HSE conditions. This was achieved by: physical means, visiting and working directly in the unit and having constant exchange and interviews with the working personal in the unit.
profile_positions.title: Intern Process Engineer - GMT

profile_positions.description:
Research development of an innovating process of methanol synthesis from CO2 and non-carbonated energy as part of the national French Project “Vitesse2”. 

•	During the master research project I developed a study of the process Matlab simulation. This, with the purpose of identifying the optimal structure for the process. 
•	I achieved the optimization of the reaction’s kinetics. 
•	I evaluated the general conditions of operation and the sensibility of the system to temporal changes on those conditions. I successfully identified the basic sensible variables of the process.
profile_positions.title: Master Researcher

school.name: ENSIC - Ecole Nationale des Industries Chimiques - Université de Lorraine

education.degree_name: Master Process Engineering, MEPP (Mechanique, Energie, Procédés, Produits)

company.name: Cementos Argos
company.description:
Hacemos posible la construcción de sueños de vivienda e infraestructura que impulsan comunidades sostenibles, prósperas e inclusivas 💚👷🏻‍💚👷‍♀️💚

Argos es una organización multinacional, productora y comercializadora de cemento, concreto y agregados, con presencia en Colombia, Estados Unidos, Centroamérica y el Caribe.

En el negocio del cemento, Argos es líder en Colombia, quinto productor más grande en América Latina y segundo más grande en el sureste de Estados Unidos. Cuenta con 7 plantas en Colombia, 4 en Estados Unidos y 2 en Centro América; 9 moliendas de clínker ubicadas en Colombia, Estados Unidos, Haití, Panamá, República Dominicana, Honduras, la Guayana Francesa y Surinam; y 33 puertos y terminales de recepción y empaque. 
 
En el negocio del concreto, Argos es líder en Colombia y tercer productor más grande en Estados Unidos. Cuenta con más de 340 plantas ubicadas en Colombia, Estados Unidos, Haití y Panamá, República Dominicana y Surinam.  
---
Argos is a multinational company that produces and markets cement and ready mix concrete through its operations in Colombia, the United States, Central America and the Caribbean.

In the cement industry, Argos is the leader in Colombia, the fifth largest producer in Latin America, and the second largest in the southeast of the United States. It has 7 plants in Colombia, 4 in the United States, and 2 in Central America. 9 clinker mills located in the United States, Haiti, Panama, the Dominican Republic, Honduras, French Guiana, and Surinam, and 33 ports and terminals for receipt and packaging.

In the concrete business, Argos is the market leader in Colombia and the second largest producer in the United States. It has more than 340 plants located in Colombia, the United States, Haiti, Panama, the Dominican Republic, and Surinam.
